field.name: descriptionString
field.String: date identifies when the resource was brought into existence

field.name: descriptionString
field.String: date identifies when the resource was issued

field.name: descriptionString
field.String: date identifies when the resource was examined or re-examined and imporved or amended

field.name: descriptionString
field.String: online instructions for transferring data from one storage device or system to another

field.name: descriptionString
field.String: online instructions for requesting the resource from the provider

field.name: descriptionString
field.String: online order process for obtening the resource

field.name: descriptionString
field.String: online search interface for seeking out information about the resource

field.name: descriptionString
field.String: digital representation of a primarily textual item (can contain illustrations also)

field.name: descriptionString
field.String: representation of a primarily textual item (can contain illustrations also) on paper, photograhic material, or other media

field.name: descriptionString
field.String: likeness of natural or man-made features, objects, and activities acquired through the sensing of visual or any other segment of the electromagnetic spectrum by sensors, such as thermal infrared, and high resolution radar and stored in digital format

field.name: descriptionString
field.String: likeness of natural or man-made features, objects, and activities acquired through the sensing of visual or any other segment of the electromagnetic spectrum by sensors, such as thermal infrared, and high resolution radar and reproduced on paper, photographic material, or other media for use directly by the human user

field.name: descriptionString
field.String: map represented in raster or vector form

field.name: descriptionString
field.String: map printed on paper, photographic material, or other media for use directly by the human user

field.name: descriptionString
field.String: multi-dimensional digital representation of a feature, process, etc.

field.name: descriptionString
field.String: vertical cross-section printed on paper, etc.

field.name: descriptionString
field.String: digital representation of facts or figures systematically displayed, especially in columns

field.name: descriptionString
field.String: representation of facts or figures systematically displayed, especially in columns, printed onpapers, photographic material, or other media

field.name: descriptionString
field.String: party that accepts accountability and responsability for the data and ensures appropriate care and maintenance of the resource

field.name: descriptionString
field.String: party who can be contacted for acquiring knowledge about or acquisition of the resource

field.name: descriptionString
field.String: key party responsible for gathering information and conducting research

field.name: descriptionString
field.String: party who has processed the data in a manner such that the resource has been modified

field.name: descriptionString
field.String: party who conducted or contributed to the research

field.name: descriptionString
field.String: method of evaluating the quality of a dataset based on inspection of items within the dataset, where all data required is internal to the dataset being evaluated

field.name: descriptionString
field.String: method of evaluating the quality of a dataset based on inspection of items within the dataset, where reference data external to the dataset being evaluated is required

field.name: descriptionString
field.String: method of evaluating the quality of a dataset based on external knowledge

field.name: descriptionString
field.String: reference from one dataset to another

field.name: descriptionString
field.String: reference to a master dataset of which this one is a part

field.name: descriptionString
field.String: part of the same structured set of data held in a computer

field.name: descriptionString
field.String: mapping and charting information from which the dataset content originates

field.name: descriptionString
field.String: part of a set of imagery that when used together, provides three-dimensional images

field.name: descriptionString
field.String: accumulation of datasets assembled for a specific purpose

field.name: descriptionString
field.String: specific performance of a function or group of functions

field.name: descriptionString
field.String: process designed to find if something is effective or valid

field.name: descriptionString
field.String: specific operation of a data collection system

field.name: descriptionString
field.String: device or piece of equipment which detects or records

field.name: descriptionString
field.String: action that is part of a series of actions

field.name: descriptionString
field.String: vehicle or other support base that holds a sensor

field.name: descriptionString
field.String: method of doing something involving a number of steps

field.name: descriptionString
field.String: document based on an experiment or research

field.name: descriptionString
field.String: process of testing to discover or demonstrate something

field.name: descriptionString
field.String: 8-bit variable size UCS Transfer Format, based on ISO/IEC 10646

field.name: descriptionString
field.String: 16-bit variable size UCS Transfer Format, based on ISO/IEC 10646

field.name: descriptionString
field.String: available for someone who can be entrusted with information

field.name: descriptionString
field.String: kept or meant to be kept private, unknown, or hidden from all but a select group of people

field.name: descriptionString
field.String: meaningful numerical representation of a physical parameter that is not the actual value of the physical parameter

field.name: descriptionString
field.String: code value with no quantitative meaning, used to represent a physical quantity

field.name: descriptionString
field.String: value in physical units of the quantity being measured

field.name: descriptionString
field.String: value of parameters used to locate physical measurements

field.name: descriptionString
field.String: values of extraneous data that are not part of the physical measurement

field.name: descriptionString
field.String: values of data from a model

field.name: descriptionString
field.String: descriptor of a set of objects that share the same attributes, operations, methods, relationships, and behavior

field.name: descriptionString
field.String: descriptor of a set of objects that share the same attributes, operations, methods, relationships, and behavior

field.name: descriptionString
field.String: data type whose instances form a list of named literal values, not extendable

field.name: descriptionString
field.String: permissible value for a codelist or enumeration

field.name: descriptionString
field.String: class that cannot be directly instantiated

field.name: descriptionString
field.String: class that is composed of classes it is connected to by an aggregate relationship

field.name: descriptionString
field.String: subclass that may be substituted for its superclass

field.name: descriptionString
field.String: class with few or no operations whose primary purpose is to hold the abstract state of another class for transmittal, storage, encoding or persistent storage

field.name: descriptionString
field.String: named set of operations that characterize the behavior of an element

field.name: descriptionString
field.String: class describing a selection of one of the specified types

field.name: descriptionString
field.String: class used for specification of a domain of instances (objects), together with the operations applicable to the objects. A type may have attributes and associations

field.name: descriptionString
field.String: semantic relationship between two classes that involves connections among their instances

field.name: descriptionString
field.String: along the direction of motion of the scan point

field.name: descriptionString
field.String: perpendicular to the direction of motion of the scan point

field.name: descriptionString
field.String: set of geometric primitives such that their boundaries can be represented as a union of other primitives

field.name: descriptionString
field.String: connected set of curves, solids or surfaces

field.name: descriptionString
field.String: bounded, 1-dimensional geometric primitive, representing the continuous image of a line

field.name: descriptionString
field.String: zero-dimensional geometric primitive, representing a position but not having an extent

field.name: descriptionString
field.String: bounded, connected 3-dimensional geometric primitive, representing the continuous image of a region of space

field.name: descriptionString
field.String: bounded, connected 2-dimensional geometric primitive, representing the continuous image of a region of a plane

field.name: descriptionString
field.String: portion of the image is blurred

field.name: descriptionString
field.String: portion of the image is partially obscured by cloud cover

field.name: descriptionString
field.String: acute angle between the plane of the ecliptic (the plane of the Earth s orbit) and the plane of the celestial equator

field.name: descriptionString
field.String: portion of the image is partially obscured by fog

field.name: descriptionString
field.String: portion of the image is partially obscured by heavy smoke or dust

field.name: descriptionString
field.String: image was taken during semi-dark conditions -- twilight conditions

field.name: descriptionString
field.String: portion of the image is obscured by shadow

field.name: descriptionString
field.String: portion of the image is obscured by snow

field.name: descriptionString
field.String: the absence of collection data of a given point or area caused by the relative location of topographic features which obstruct the collection path between the collector(s) and the subject(s) of interest

field.name: descriptionString
field.String: keyword identifies a data center related to the resource

field.name: descriptionString
field.String: keyword identifies a temporal or spatial resolution

field.name: descriptionString
field.String: keyword identifies a branch of instruction or specialized learning

field.name: descriptionString
field.String: keyword identifies the instrument used to collect the resource

field.name: descriptionString
field.String: keyword identifies the platform used to collect the resource

field.name: descriptionString
field.String: keyword identifies a project related to the resource

field.name: descriptionString
field.String: keyword identifies the layer(s) of any deposited substance

field.name: descriptionString
field.String: keyword identifies a time period related to the dataset

field.name: descriptionString
field.String: keyword identifies a particular subject or topic

field.name: descriptionString
field.String: data is repeatedly and frequently updated

field.name: descriptionString
field.String: data is updated on a weekly basis

field.name: descriptionString
field.String: data is updated every two weeks

field.name: descriptionString
field.String: data is updated every three months

field.name: descriptionString
field.String: data is updated twice each year

field.name: descriptionString
field.String: data is updated as deemed necessary

field.name: descriptionString
field.String: data is updated in intervals that are uneven in duration

field.name: descriptionString
field.String: there are no plans to update the data

field.name: descriptionString
field.String: frequency of maintenance for the data is not known

field.name: descriptionString
field.String: CoPy In / Out (UNIX file format and command)

field.name: descriptionString
field.String: information processing volume and file structure of CD-ROM

field.name: descriptionString
field.String: half inch cartridge streaming tape drive

field.name: descriptionString
field.String: linkage through a satellite communication system

field.name: descriptionString
field.String: pamphlet or leaflet giving descriptive information

field.name: descriptionString
field.String: element is required when a specific condition is met

field.name: descriptionString
field.String: point halfway between the lower left and the upper right of the pixel

field.name: descriptionString
field.String: the corner in the pixel closest to the origin of the SRS; if two are at the same distance from the origin, the one with the smallest x-value

field.name: descriptionString
field.String: next corner counterclockwise from the lower left

field.name: descriptionString
field.String: next corner counterclockwise from the lower right

field.name: descriptionString
field.String: next corner counterclockwise from the upper right

field.String: production of the data has been completed

field.String: data has been stored in an offline storage facility

field.name: descriptionString
field.String: data needs to be generated or updated

field.name: descriptionString
field.String: data is currently in the process of being created

field.name: descriptionString
field.String: exclusive right to the publication, production, or sale of the rights to a literary, dramatic, musical, or artistic work, or to the use of a commercial print or label, granted by law for a specified period of time to an author, composer, artist, distributor

field.name: descriptionString
field.String: government has granted exclusive right to make, sell, use or license an invention or discovery

field.name: descriptionString
field.String: produced or sold information awaiting a patent

field.name: descriptionString
field.String: a name, symbol, or other device identifying a product, officially registered and legally restricted to the use of the owner or manufacturer

field.name: descriptionString
field.String: rights to financial benefit from and control of distribution of non-tangible property that is a result of creativity

field.name: descriptionString

field.String: vector data is used to represent geographic data

field.String: three-dimensional view formed by the intersecting homologous rays of an overlapping pair of images

field.name: descriptionString
field.String: geometry objects without any additional structure which describes topology

field.name: descriptionString
field.String: 1-dimensional topological complex -- commonly called chain-node topology

field.name: descriptionString
field.String: 1-dimensional topological complex that is planar. (A planar graph is a graph that can be drawn in a plane in such a way that no two edges intersect except at a vertex.)

field.name: descriptionString
field.String: 2-dimensional topological complex that is planar. (A 2-dimensional topological complex is commonly called full topology in a cartographic 2D environment.)

field.name: descriptionString
field.String: 1-dimensional topological complex that is isomorphic to a subset of a surface. (A geometric complex is isomorphic to a topological complex if their elements are in a one-to-one, dimensional-and boundry-preserving correspondence to one another.)

field.name: descriptionString
field.String: 2-dimensional topological complex that is isomorphic to a subset of a surface

field.name: descriptionString
field.String: 3-dimensional topological complex. (A topological complex is a collection of topological primitives that are closed under the boundary operations.)

field.name: descriptionString
field.String: complete coverage of a 3D Euclidean coordinate space

field.name: descriptionString
field.String: topological complex without any specified geometric realisation

field.name: descriptionString
field.String: width of a distribution equal to the distance between the outer two points on the distribution having power level half of that at the peak

field.String: The referencing entity applies to a transfer aggregate which was originally identified as an initiative (DS_Initiative)
